metadata.title: CVE-2024-24820 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
(Icinga Director is a tool designed to make Icinga 2 configuration hand...)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icingaweb2-module-director - 1.11.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icingaweb2-module-director package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.1-1').
